headline: A Look At Paycom Software (PAYC) Valuation As AI Jitters And Beti Model Draw Fresh Attention
summary: Paycom Software (PAYC) is back on investors’ radar as attention turns to its Beti self-service payroll model, sector-wide AI disruption worries, and the return of long-time sales leader Jeff York as chief sales officer. See our latest analysis for Paycom Software. The recent sector-wide AI sell-off and questions around Beti’s role in Paycom’s model have coincided with a sharp reset in sentiment. A 30 day share price return of 18.42% and a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 38.99%...

headline: Jeff York’s Return Puts Paycom Sales Execution Back In Focus
summary: Paycom Software (NYSE:PAYC) announced that Jeff York is returning as Chief Sales Officer. York previously held the same role at Paycom and is known for his influence on the company’s sales organization and culture. The move marks a meaningful leadership shift for the human capital management provider. Paycom Software focuses on cloud based human capital management tools, serving businesses that want payroll, HR, and talent management on a single platform. The company operates in a...
